title: Bug 6656 - Close button moves down when view resized smaller
OB: When the Navigator view is resized smaller on Linux using build 20011127 (not reproducible on build 20011116 on NT2000), the close button moves below the label.
EB: The close button should remain aligned with the label even when the Navigator view is resized smaller.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Launch the application on Linux using build 20011127. 2. Open the Navigator view. 3. Resize the view to make it smaller. 4. Observe that the close button moves below the label.
